statements: SELECT * FROM board_meeting_minutes;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, meeting_time FROM board_meeting_minutes;
SELECT meeting_date, attendees FROM board_meeting_minutes ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT meeting_time FROM board_meeting_minutes;
SELECT meeting_id, agenda, minutes FROM board_meeting_minutes WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM board_meeting_minutes WHERE meeting_id = 1;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, attendees FROM board_meeting_minutes WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY meeting_date ASC;
SELECT meeting_id, agenda FROM board_meeting_minutes WHERE array_length(attendees, 1) > 3;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_time FROM board_meeting_minutes WHERE minutes LIKE '%action items%';
SELECT meeting_id, agenda, minutes FROM board_meeting_minutes WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM board_meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date FROM board_meetings WHERE meeting_location = 'Conference Room A';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_meetings FROM board_meetings;
SELECT meeting_location, COUNT(*) AS total_meeting_location FROM board_meetings GROUP BY meeting_location;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_role FROM attendees WHERE is_present = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM board_meetings WHERE meeting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_role FROM attendees WHERE is_present = TRUE;
SELECT meeting_location, meeting_date FROM board_meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE attendee_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_location, meeting_notes FROM board_meetings JOIN attendees ON board_meetings.meeting_id = attendees.meeting_id;
SELECT * FROM board_meeting_minutes;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, agenda_topic FROM board_meeting_minutes;
SELECT attendee_id, attendee_name, role FROM attendees;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type, document_path FROM documents;
SELECT * FROM board_meeting_minutes WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM board_meeting_minutes WHERE meeting_id = 1;
SELECT meeting_date, agenda_topic FROM board_meeting_minutes WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_name, role FROM attendees WHERE role = 'Chairperson';
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM documents WHERE meeting_id = 2 ORDER BY document_name DESC;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, COUNT(attendee_id) AS total_attendees FROM board_meeting_minutes JOIN attendees ON board_meeting_minutes.meeting_id = attendees.meeting_id GROUP BY meeting_id;
SELECT * FROM board_meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, meeting_location FROM board_meetings;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM agenda_items ORDER BY agenda_title DESC;
SELECT meeting_id, COUNT(agenda_item_id) AS agenda_count FROM agenda_items GROUP BY meeting_id;
SELECT * FROM board_meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, meeting_location FROM board_meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_id, attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY attendee_name;
SELECT agenda_title, agenda_description FROM agenda_items WHERE agenda_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM minutes WHERE approved = false ORDER BY meeting_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM BoardMembers;
SELECT full_name, position FROM BoardMembers WHERE position = 'Chairperson';
SELECT meeting_date, agenda_details FROM MeetingAgendas ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT member_id, minute_text FROM MeetingMinutes WHERE member_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_attendees FROM MeetingAttendees WHERE meeting_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM BoardMembers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, position FROM BoardMembers WHERE position IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM MeetingAgendas WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY meeting_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT m.full_name, a.agenda_details FROM BoardMembers m JOIN MeetingMinutes mi ON m.member_id = mi.member_id JOIN MeetingAgendas a ON mi.meeting_id = a.agenda_id;

SELECT ma.meeting_date, COUNT(att.attachment_id) AS total_attachments FROM MeetingAgendas ma LEFT JOIN MeetingAttachments att ON ma.agenda_id = att.meeting_id GROUP BY ma.meeting_date ORDER BY total_attachments DESC;
